name: SeedSweep Policy Binding
description: Enforces SeedSweep preflight and resume gates in evaluate()

gates.requirement: An APPROVED + GREEN SeedSweep artifact must exist
The active SeedSweep artifact must be APPROVED + GREEN

notes: Preflight ensures human has reviewed system state before compilation begins
Resume ensures SeedSweep actually completed (all phases confirmed by HUMAN)
GREEN stoplight required = all .03 holding spaces filled, no RED signals
